== How to Hack a Cell Phone ==

In this series of pages I will discuss how to successfully "modify" a cellular phone and use it to build a transmitter. In this iteration of the project I am using a [http://www.phonescoop.com/phones/phone.php?p=1535 Motorola W260g]. It costs a whopping $15, so don't worry about screwing up if you decide to follow this guide for your own purposes.
